content: BTW @Nick Robison I added https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/smart-scheduling-links/commit/ee7d93748fb263ebec7e7e1479bf3f8bb7125e12 with guidance on how servers can include a header like Cache-Control: max-age=300.

This seemed like the most straightforward guidance, rather than using Expires (more limited scope, overriden by Cache-Control) or Retry-After (usually for errors or redirects) but let me know if you think something else would be preferable.
